instruction: Provide a summary of the article below in 300 characters or less.
input: In recent years, renewable energy sources like solar, water and wind have become increasingly popular in many countries around the world. As the cost of solar panels, wind turbines and other technologies falls, more and more households and businesses are turning to these sustainable, clean sources of energy. In the United States, the number of residential and commercial solar installations has more than quadrupled since 2010.
output: Renewable energy sources like solar, water and wind have become increasingly popular in many countries around the world due to a decrease in cost. The U.S. has had an impressive surge in residential and commercial solar installation since 2010, with a fourfold increase in such installations.
